entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Introduction

Hello, I'm Ty Kowalewski, a software engineer with nearly a decade of experience in the field. My ambition isto author a technical how-to book (stay tuned for more details!). To hone my writing skills and stay committed to thisendeavor, I've decided to embark on a blogging journey. As I continue to evolve in my career, I aim to expand my impactbeyond my current workplace, and this blog is the first step in that direction.

Outside of work, I am married, am a proud parent, and spend my free time practicing Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.
entry.summary:
